messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Asteroids are big rocks that fly in space. Now NASA is trying to find smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres wide or more. NASA thinks there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size. Until now, NASA found about 8,000. So, there are still 17,000 to find. This is important. In 2013, a small asteroid exploded over a city in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it hurt 1,200 people. So, these bigger asteroids are a very big danger if they come near Earth.

messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Asteroids are big rocks that fly in space. Now NASA is trying to find smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres wide or more. NASA thinks there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size. So far, NASA found about 8,000. This means there are still 17,000 to find. This is important. In 2013, a small asteroid broke apart over a city in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it hurt 1,200 people. So, these bigger asteroids are a very big danger if they come near Earth.
